-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/f-o-a-m/hs-abci-server#readme</a>
@package hs-abci-extra
@version 0.1.0.0

module Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger

-- | Logger middleware for ABCI messages with custom <a>LogEnv</a> and
--   <a>Namespace</a>. This method makes it easy use various scribes such
--   as <a>elastic-search</a>.
mkLogger :: MonadIO m => LogEnv -> Namespace -> Middleware m

-- | Logger middleware for ABCI messages in app with KatipContext. Great
--   for `App m` with a <a>KatipContext</a> instance.
mkLoggerM :: KatipContext m => Middleware m
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.GlobalMessageContext
instance Katip.Core.ToObject Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.GlobalMessageContext
instance Katip.Core.LogItem Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.GlobalMessageContext
instance Katip.Core.ToObject (Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.Loggable (Network.ABCI.Server.App.Request t))
instance Katip.Core.LogItem (Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.Loggable (Network.ABCI.Server.App.Request t))
instance Katip.Core.ToObject (Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.Loggable (Network.ABCI.Server.App.Response t))
instance Katip.Core.LogItem (Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Logger.Loggable (Network.ABCI.Server.App.Response t))

module Network.ABCI.Server.Middleware.Metrics
defaultBuckets :: [UpperBound]

-- | Metrics logger middleware for ABCI server already within the
--   KatipContext. Great for `App m` with a <tt>KatipContext</tt> instance.
mkMetricsMiddleware :: MonadIO m => [UpperBound] -> Registry -> IO (Middleware m)
